items.headline: Oracle’s stock surges toward its best day since 1999. These huge numbers explain why.
items.summary_en: While the latest earnings and revenue numbers came up short, Oracle impressed with its talk of new multibillion-dollar deals and big cloud projections.

items.headline: Trump aims to curb direct-to-consumer ads for drugs. Hims & Hers Health could be targeted.
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump’s administration on Tuesday rolled out an executive action aimed at limiting direct-to-consumer advertising for pharmaceuticals, with officials saying a recent Hims & Hers Health Inc. ad stood out as an example of what should be prevented.

items.headline: UnitedHealth makes investors like Warren Buffett happy by saying business is fine
items.summary_en: UnitedHealth’s stock is surging, which is giving a nice boost to Warren Buffett’s new 5 million-share stake in the health insurer.

items.headline: GameStop posts 5th straight quarterly profit, thanks to a big sales jump
items.summary_en: The original meme stock reported a 22% rise in sales and a fifth consecutive profit, sending it more than 4% higher after hours Tuesday.

items.headline: Cracker Barrel is halting remodels. An analyst now sees even ‘less visibility’ on the path forward.
items.summary_en: After abandoning a refreshed logo last month in response to anger from conservatives, Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc. on Tuesday said it was suspending its remodels, a move one analyst said clouded the path forward for the restaurant chain.
